column1: Although this year has been certainly tough for us all today is a special day to give thanks & remember the many ways we’ve been blessed.   From the Roby family to yours we wish you a very happy Thanksgiving! https://t.co/q4fVWa4v6a

As we are coming up on an exciting next few days here in Alabama w/ Thanksgiving tomorrow & the Iron Bowl on Saturday please be sure to follow all guidelines implemented by our public officials to keep your families & those around you safe. https://t.co/Og9860LBQV

As we approach the Thanksgiving holiday please be mindful of any safety measures & precautions that have been put in place to help protect your family & those around you. Read more from my Weekly Column via @yhn: https://t.co/PuVTFktr0H
@RiponSociety @SusanWBrooks Thanks for having us @RiponSociety! It is always an honor to join you.
⬇️Stay safe this Thanksgiving with tips from @ALPublicHealth⬇️ https://t.co/JKvHsHqhph

The holiday season is upon us & brings many exciting opportunities to gather & celebrate with family & friends. During the holidays it’s important to remember #COVID19 continues to progress among our communities. Read more from my Weekly Column via @yhn: https://t.co/NgNLRCycjN

It was an honor to attend the dedication of John Robert Lewis Hall at Troy University yesterday. John’s legacy will impact the Troy community & the state of Alabama for years to come. https://t.co/TDAUhuIxj0

Fantastic news for #AL02! Southeast Alabama is home to many peanut farmers & it's the perfect location for Golden Boy Foods to expand its peanut manufacturing production. Read more from @GovernorKayIvey: https://t.co/36Nk5wG9DP

#COVID19 jeopardizes decades of progress & U.S. investment in global child health & survival. We must work together to make sure gains made are not lost. This #ChildHealthWeek let’s pave a new & better way forward for children everywhere.

While we should honor the service of our veterans every day Veterans Day provides a unique opportunity to come together as a nation & pay tribute to the men & women who put their lives on the line for our freedom. Read more from my Weekly Column via @yhn: https://t.co/0agjnBbjTO
Wishing a Happy #VeteransDay to all who have served. We would not have the freedom & opportunity we enjoy without your service & sacrifice & we can never say thank you enough. https://t.co/OIV5yCIFtp
Thank you to all the men & women who serve in the U.S. Marine Corps to defend our nation. https://t.co/2sFQb5hP2K

We've been given the right to freely & openly express our beliefs & opinions participate in civil public discourse & vote to elect those who lead our nation. I encourage you to exercise your right to vote tomorrow & participate in the democratic process. Read more via @yhn: https://t.co/pdBEHsMS2B

Lastly be sure you are receiving some form of emergency weather alerts by phone radio or TV. My office will continue to monitor the situation & release guidance as needed.

There is a very significant risk of historic rainfall & flooding across the state. Please take all warnings from public officials seriously & evacuate immediately if you are in a low-lying area or an area prone to flooding.

Just finished up a call w/ @fema @NHC_Atlantic @AlabamaEMA & @Redcross to discuss the latest on #HurricaneSally response efforts. It's critical for you & your family's safety to listen & follow the warnings of state & local officials.
